name: fierySpace
description:
fierySpace - throw the pieces of wood away as you try not to get hurt by the fire to save space to move around, keep in mind that you will get very thirsty  around such hot objects. Never forget to protect yourself and  if you are not doing well, then just eat some apples, that might help :)

Over the time you will do some mistakes and the game becomes harder and harder until you will lose.

One "round" needs for my around 6 minutes and thirty seconds but that completely depends on your skill, you can play smart, show your jump and run skills or both :)

Controls - WASD to move | E to interact | to pickup just walk next to it

personally - Thanks for visiting my game's page :) This is by far the best game I've made so far and I hope you like it and may leave some good or hopefully not so good feedback :)
